item.title: dani add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "Is it possible for home to be a person and not a place?" -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: dani add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "The only French word I know is oui, which means “yes,” and only recently did I learn it’s spelled o-​u-​i and not w-​e-​e." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: dani add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "There is no pretending," Jace said with absolute clarity. "I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there is life after that, I'll love you then." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: dani add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: dani add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "And now I’m looking at you,” he said, “and you’re asking me if I still want you, as if I could stop loving you. As if I would want to give up the thing that makes me stronger than anything else ever has. I never dared give much of myself to anyone before – bits of myself to the Lightwoods, to Isabelle and Alec, but it took years to do it – but, Clary, since the first time I saw you, I have belonged to you completely. I still do. If you want me." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: dani add a quote by J.K. Rowling
dani add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: dani add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "Fall down again, Bella?' No, Emmett, I punched a werewolf in the face." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: dani add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I wish I could freeze this moment, right here, right now and live in it forever." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: dani add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Don't you think it's better to be extremely happy for a short while, even if you lose it, than to be just okay for your whole life?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: dani add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: dani add a quote by Jandy Nelson
item.description: "The sky is everywhere, it begins at your feet." -- Jandy Nelson

item.title: dani add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I might be in love with you." He smiles a little. "I'm waiting until I'm sure to tell you, though." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: dani add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: dani add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "Losing me will hurt; it will be the kind of pain that won't feel real at first, and when it does, it will take her breath away." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: dani add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't need water to feel like you're drowning, do you?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: dani add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: dani add a quote by Beth Revis
item.description: "I never thought about how important the sky was until I didn't have one." -- Beth Revis

item.title: dani add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "You have to know what you stand for, not just what you stand against." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: dani add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "It's easier not to say anything. Shut your trap, button your lip, can it. All that crap you hear on TV about communication and expressing feelings is a lie. Nobody really wants to hear what you have to say." -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: dani add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Maybe I'm dreaming you. Maybe you're dreaming me; maybe we only exist in each other's dreams and every morning when we wake up we forget all about each other." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: dani add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: dani add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You can't live your life for other people. You've got to do what's right for you, even if it hurts some people you love." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: dani add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "But I believe good things happen everyday. I believe good things happen even when bad things happen. And I believe on a happy day like today, we can still feel a little sad. And that's life, isn't it?" -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: dani add a quote by Gabrielle Zevin
item.description: "People, you'll find, aren't usually all good or bad. Sometimes they're just a little bit good and a whole lot bad. And sometimes they're mostly good with a dash of bad. And most of us, well, we fall in the middle somewhere." -- Gabrielle Zevin

item.title: dani add a quote by John Green
item.description: "My thoughts are stars I can't fathom into constellations." -- John Green

item.title: dani add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "I have hated words and I have loved them, and I hope I have made them right." -- Markus Zusak

item.title: dani add a quote by Markus Zusak
item.description: "Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day." -- Markus Zusak
